statements: SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_schedule;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_schedule;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_schedule WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT initiative_name, location FROM guerrilla_marketing_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, location FROM guerrilla_marketing_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_schedule WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, location, end_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, start_date, end_date, location FROM guerrilla_marketing_schedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY initiative_id;
SELECT initiative_name, location FROM guerrilla_marketing_schedule WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' AND (location = 'Chicago' OR location = 'Los Angeles');
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_initiatives, MAX(end_date) AS latest_end_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_schedule WHERE location IN ('London', 'Paris', 'Berlin');
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, location, start_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_initiatives WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM marketing_team WHERE team_size >= 3 ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT initiative_name, location, budget FROM guerrilla_marketing_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_team ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_initiatives ORDER BY initiative_name DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, location, budget FROM guerrilla_marketing_initiatives WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM marketing_team WHERE team_size >= 5 ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_initiatives WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_team WHERE team_lead LIKE '%John%' AND start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GuerrillaMarketingTimeline
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM GuerrillaMarketingTimeline
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_lead FROM MarketingTeam
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_type FROM GuerrillaInitiatives
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM GuerrillaMarketingTimeline
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM GuerrillaMarketingTimeline WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM GuerrillaInitiatives WHERE initiative_type = 'Outdoor' ORDER BY initiative_name ASC;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, initiative_name, initiative_type FROM GuerrillaMarketingTimeline INNER JOIN GuerrillaInitiatives ON GuerrillaMarketingTimeline.campaign_id = GuerrillaInitiatives.campaign_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM MarketingTeam ORDER BY team_size DESC, team_name ASC;

SELECT t1.campaign_name, t1.budget, t2.team_name, t2.team_lead FROM GuerrillaMarketingTimeline t1 JOIN MarketingTeam t2 ON t1.campaign_id = t2.team_id WHERE t1.budget > 5000 AND t2.team_size >= 5 ORDER BY t1.budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns;
SELECT location, budget FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM MarketingTeam WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_cost FROM MarketingMaterials WHERE material_cost < 1000;
SELECT * FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, location, budget FROM GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_size FROM MarketingTeam WHERE team_size <= 10 AND team_name LIKE '%Marketing%';
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date, schedule_time FROM MarketingSchedule WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, schedule_time ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_cost FROM MarketingMaterials WHERE material_cost BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY material_cost DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Guerrilla_Marketing_Initiatives;
SELECT team_name, leader_id, team_size FROM Team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT member_name, member_email, role FROM Members WHERE role='Marketing';
SELECT task_description, deadline, task_status FROM Tasks WHERE task_status='Pending' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_content FROM Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Guerrilla_Marketing_Initiatives;
SELECT initiative_name, budget, start_date FROM Guerrilla_Marketing_Initiatives WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT Team.team_name, Members.member_name FROM Team INNER JOIN Members ON Team.leader_id = Members.member_id;
SELECT task_description, deadline, task_status FROM Tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_content FROM Reports WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
